programme.title: Unusual Weddings - EP 8

On the wedding day, the bride's face is painted with a thick layer of white, earning her the affectionate nickname "zombie bride."

programme.desc: A girl named Marini was forced to marry a loan shark. Marini was determined to work in Garut to pay off her father's debt to the loan shark. Then, there was Mas Raka, the grandson of the owner of the place where Marini worked. He was a grumpy person, while Mas Wisesa was sweeter than Mas Raka. While working, it turned out that Raka and Wisesa liked Marini. Raka was even jealous of Marini because she was closer to Wisesa.

programme.desc: At a hospital or clinic, Rangga and Intan met, and fell in love at first sight. programme.desc: Fira (Yasmin Napper) is extremely stressed because her family is bankrupt and she has to work on her grandfather's chicken farm. At the chicken farm, Fira meets Erwin (Ridho Ilahi), who is assigned to find chickens for his restaurant. Erwin actually has a phobia of chickens, but to gain Grandma's trust, Erwin is forced to do it. Fira and Erwin also often fight.

programme.desc: Eve (Jennifer Eve) has to deal with an annoying boss. He refuses to accept anything from her if she's late. If Eve is even a minute late, he will scold her. programme.title: Opocot Melatah Budak Pejabat - EP 8

programme.title: My Sweet RT - EP 4

programme.title: Isteri Halal - EP 64
programme.desc: Helah Bedah dapat dikesan oleh Dr Farhan. Namun Bedah keliru kerana Dr Farhan juga ada agenda tersendiri. Maria terkejut apabila Mak Pah tiba-tiba muncul dan menyerangnya. Eyra mula mendekati Maria.

programme.title: Naluri Hati - EP 21
programme.desc: Pada hari perkahwinannya, Dinda teragak-agak kerana dia akan berkahwin dengan orang yang tidak dicintainya. Namun, satu kejadian berlaku dan menyebabkan Dinda mengalami amnesia separa.

programme.title: RASA Projek Gerenti Jadi - EP 5
programme.desc: Majalah masakan di Malaysia kini di kaca televisyen anda memaparkan resepi - resepi menarik setiap minggu yang dihoskan oleh Norzaini Abdul Halim (Aunty Aini) bersama - sama Adam Mahamed Ismail.

programme.title: The House: Ezurin Khyra - EP 4
programme.desc: The House menampilkan Ezurin Khyra yang sering menjadi sorotan kerana imej glamornya. Program ini juga menayangkan keperibadian ibu kepada lima orang cahaya mata ini yang tidak diketahui umum.

programme.title: Pengantin Lelaki Untuk Cik Gadis - EP 23

programme.title: VINODHINI

programme.title: LAKSHMI

programme.desc: As a nature enthusiast, emilie is very interested in the behaviour of insects and other small creatures. What do ants eat? Why are frogs slimy? Can a tortoise catch a cold? No question goes unasked!

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera

programme.title: Le Miracle Suisse
programme.desc: The Swiss are wise and reasonable. But, they sometimes have a crazy side. They speak four languages, vote all the time, love trains, cows, military paraphernalia, garden gnomes, cleanliness, play music to their cheeses and do unlikely sports...

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Breaking down stereotypes, cliches and preconceived ideas, whatever the culture, nationality, sexual orientation, social background... Recounted by Magloire, through his story and the interwoven portraits of others, the series "Rassemblance" shows that integration is possible, that difference is an advantage for the common good, helping us to live together better.

programme.desc: Winner of the Giro d'Italia, the Tour de France, and the World Championship in 1987, he is one of only three riders along with Eddy Merckx and Tadej Pogacar to have achieved this triple. Former cyclist Stephen Roche reflects on his career.

programme.title: Hep Taxi !
programme.desc: In town or in the countryside, day or night, Jerome Colin, the presenter-taxi driver leads his prestigious customer on a four-wheel journey conducive to secrets.

programme.title: Les Maitres Du Champagne
programme.desc: Associated with elegance and luxury, champagne is one of the most prestigious wines of French heritage, characterized by unique know-how and subject to a controlled designation of origin. But how did a simple wine grown in a rather mediocre wine-growing region become this exceptional beverage?

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 30
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 12
programme.desc: The Maison des Canuts traces the long tradition of Lyon's gold, silver and silk weavers. Each creation by visual artist Sarah Valente sounds like a call from the forest. Zomer is turning fashion upside down. In Brittany, craftsman Thibaut Thierry works paper with seaweed.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Savourer - EP 14
programme.desc: On the menu: Nordic prawn cocktail, warm salad with root vegetables, maple-glazed turkey breast, chocolate and nut cheesecake.

programme.title: Carbone - EP 12
programme.desc: And what if the best way to appreciate the value of life was to get up close and personal with a skeleton or two? We meet an extraordinary great-grandfather, founder of a totally unique museum on Green Island.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Les Nouveaux Boss - EP 4
programme.desc: The very first pan-African audiovisual competition for entrepreneurs. For eight weeks, sixteen candidates from all over Africa will be accompanied by four exceptional mentors as they develop their project: Claude Borna, A'Salfo, Nicole Sulu and Yassine Laghzioui. A number of celebrities will also come to talk about their experiences, including champion Teddy Riner.

programme.title: Marc-Antoine Le Bret - Solo
programme.desc: A glimpse of what might happen if the world turned upside down... From La Cigale in Paris, ''Solo'', Marc-Antoine Le Bret's show, still alone on stage but with a hundred voices and brand-new sketches!

programme.title: Les Petits Meurtres D'agatha Christie
programme.desc: The presenter of the programme ''Aux Frontieres du Cosmos'' is found murdered, in mysterious circumstances. programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 26
programme.desc: We sit down for an exclusive interview with the first of two new Premier League Hall of fame inductees, Eden Hazard. A celebrated footballer who lit up the English top-flight during his illustrious career; a winner of multiple domestic and European honours, he became a true legend of the Premier League era. He reflects on his rise to the top, the moments that defined his career, and the immense pride he feels at joining the elite ranks of the Premier League's greatest ever players.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 27
programme.desc: We sit down for an exclusive interview with the second of two new Premier League Hall of fame inductees, Gary Neville. From his journey from Class of '92 prodigy to Premier League Hall of Fame icon, he talks us through the moments that defined his legacy at Manchester United. A story on one of the league's most influential right-backs and a leader whose impact still shapes English football today.

programme.title: THE CATCH-UP SHOW - EP 19

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 20
programme.desc: Few players have left a mark on the Premier League quite like five-time champion, Michael Carrick. This week, the former West Ham, Tottenham Hotspur and Manchester United midfielder sits down with the Big Interview to discuss growing up in the shadow of St James' Park, his early introduction to football, and his journey to the very pinnacle of the Premier League.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 30
programme.desc: Three decades on from Manchester United's iconic Class of '92, PL Stories steps beyond the headline names to rediscover the teammates who shared the same dressing room, dreams, and demands of one of football's most revered youth systems. We sit down with the lesser-known graduates who lived that journey first-hand, players whose paths diverged from the global spotlight but whose experiences offer a rare and revealing window into the reality behind the legend.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 18
programme.desc: Resilience is a word that encapsulates Manchester United centre back Harry Maguire. Since joining Old Trafford for a then world record fee for a defender, Maguire has been at the heart of the highs and lows in a tumultuous period in the club's illustrious history. Despite setbacks including losing the captaincy, being dropped by England and the worst season in the club's history last term, Maguire has never taken a backwards step.

programme.desc: We sit down for an exclusive interview with the first of two new Premier League Hall of fame inductees, Eden Hazard. A celebrated footballer who lit up the English top-flight during his illustrious career; a winner of multiple domestic and European honours, he became a true legend of the Premier League era. He reflects on his rise to the top, the moments that defined his career, and the immense pride he feels at joining the elite ranks of the Premier League's greatest ever players.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Garreth McLellan vs. Dricus Du Plessis
programme.desc: Check out exciting action from MMA organizations around the world. This episode features coverage of mixed martial arts in South Africa including two fighters duke it out for the EFC Worldwide Middleweight Championship in Garreth "Soldier Boy" McLellan vs. Dricus "Stillknocks" Du Plessis. Bonus coverage includes Texier Kabesa vs. Luke Michael from Durban, South Africa.

programme.title: WCCB Janibek Alimkhanuly vs. Anauel Ngamissengue
programme.desc: Undefeated WBO and IBF Middleweight World Champion Janibek Alimkhanuly will look to defend his titles in his home country of Kazakhstan when he faces fellow undefeated middleweight Anauel Ngamissengue of France. Both fighters bring substantial power into the contest, with Janibek having won nine of his last ten bouts by stoppage, and Ngamissengue stopping six of his last seven.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: In the season finale, they're playing for national pride. All-Stars from "American Ninja Warrior" face off against teams from Japan and Europe for bragging rights.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Paul Williams vs. Antonio Margarito
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a WBO welterweight title bout featuring then-undefeated Paul Williams and Antonio Margarito. It's a closely scored bout, but one fighter's push towards a strong finish may have put him ahead just enough.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 5 featuring Mitakeumi, Takakeisho, Goeido and Asanoyama from the Nagoya basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Todd Foster
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector "Macho" Camacho (47-3-0 21 KO) faces Todd Foster (33-3-0 29 KO) in a 12-round contest for the vacant IBC Welterweight Title from Atlantic City New Jersey USA.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Mike Tyson vs. Sammy Scaff
programme.desc: The talk of the boxing world takes center stage as a young Mike Tyson displays the lethal combination of speed and power that would later make him a World Champion. Tyson enters the Felt Forum in New York City with a 13-0 record, having knocked out every opponent he's faced thus far, with 9 of those knockouts coming in the first round.

This episode features undefeated featherweights Yuriorkis Gamboa, 'El Cinclon de Guantanamo', (11-0, 9 KOs) and Marcos Ramirez (25-0, 16 KOs) from the Pechanga Resort and Casino in Temecula, California, USA, on October 4, 2008. The two young fighters had a quick ending street brawl that brought the crowd to its feet.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: Featuring Men's CMX Forms and Weapons, and a World Record Break by Chip Townsend at the ISKA US Open from Disney, Orlando, Florida, USA.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights James Kirkland vs. Alfredo Angulo
programme.desc: This episode features James Kirkland as he faces Alfredo Angulo in an explosive, hard-hitting fight, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Shane Mosley vs. Floyd Mayweather, Jr.
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a heavily-anticipated welterweight bout featuring Floyd Mayweather, Jr. and "Sugar" Shane Mosley. The fight, which generated $78 million in revenue, was Mayweather's first title fight since his comeback from his first retirement. Also on the card, heavyweight Bermane Stiverne and two-weight world champ Marcos Maidana.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 2 featuring Chiyonokuni, Tamawashi, Takayasu and Chiyotairyu from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Heath Todd
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector "Macho" Camacho (61-3-1 29 KO) vs. Heath Todd (32-10-0 13 KO) in a 10-round Halbmittel contest from the War Memorial Auditorium in Ft. Lauderdale FL USA.

programme.title: My Unique B&B (S2) - EP 4
programme.desc: Simon's team is in Warwickshire to turn a 200-year-old turret into a medieval-themed B&B. The tiny two-floored building may look like a turret on the outside, but on the inside it's a bland office.

programme.title: Grand Designs (S21) - EP 10
programme.desc: In Northamptonshire, Adam and Tassy convert a 20-metre-high water tower into a fun family home with curved walls, slides, secret rooms, a firefighter's pole, a swimming pool and a sky garden

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Chocolat (S1) - EP 6

programme.title: Jason Atherton's Dubai Dishes (S2) - EP 8
programme.desc: Jason is on a health trip out of Dubai to discover the beauty of the desert.

programme.title: Gino's Italy: Secrets of the South (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Gino is in the city of Gallipoli. He joins a diver on her small boat as they head to the sea caves. She forages for red oysters which they eat with a glass of rose. Gino heads into town and tries out Scapece, a dish of fish in saffron and of religious significance in the city. Inspired by the the saffron and fresh fish, Gino demonstrates the Puglian classic Tiella, the Italian answer to paella, made with mussels, rice and potatoes.

programme.title: Guillaume's Paris (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: Chef Guillaume Brahimi checks out the 17th and 18th arrondissements of Paris, where he explores a mushroom farm in an underground car park.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall (S2) - EP 4
programme.desc: Cornwall has more than its fair share of folktales. Perhaps the most famous is found near Land's End, where Rick recounts the tale of the Mermaid of Zennor. A short distance away, Rick joins a small army of seaweed harvesters who are feeding an increasing appetite for a natural food more common in Japan.

programme.title: American Greed - EP 222
programme.desc: "American Greed" goes inside the dark side of the American Dream - where money seduces, power corrupts, and smooth criminals will stop at nothing to get rich.

programme.title: Unlocked - EP 201
programme.desc: Unlocked is a home tour series focused on how much people across the globe spend on their housing, what they get for the money and what they had to sacrifice to make it happen. CNBC opens the doors to unique homes and introduces you to the people inside so you can see what it's like to live there and exactly how much it costs.

programme.title: Mad Money 20th Anniversary
programme.desc: Jim Cramer’s "Mad Money" celebrates 20 years on CNBC.

programme.title: Executive Decisions - EP 5
programme.desc: ‘Executive Decisions’ is a CNBC podcast offering a rare window into the minds of top decision-makers. Hosted by Steve Sedgwick, each episode explores the pivotal choices that shape the careers and legacies of business leaders and policymakers. Through candid conversations about risk, doubt and conviction, the series reminds us that even the most powerful face uncertainty and trade-offs.

programme.title: CNBC Explains - EP 1
programme.desc: ‘CNBC Explains’ is a dynamic explainer series that dives deep into the forces shaping our world. Each episode unpacks complex business and economic topics, breaking them down into clear, compelling narratives. With expert insights, data-driven visuals and a global perspective, this series helps viewers understand not just what is happening, but why it matters.

programme.title: American Greed - EP 217

programme.title: Unlocked - EP 110
programme.desc: CNBC's Unlocked takes an inside look at how much people spend on housing, what they get for their money and what they've had to sacrifice to turn their real estate dreams into reality.

programme.title: Worldwide Exchange - EP 1
programme.desc: Broadcast from CNBC Global Headquarters in Englewood Cliffs, N.J., CNBC’s "Worldwide Exchange" delivers essential, actionable information and analysis for anyone who wants to be part of the global business conversation. Anchored by Frank Holland, the program prepares CNBC’s worldwide audience with a smart take on overnight U.S. news and live international market action.

programme.title: The Observers
programme.desc: The Observers on France 24 is a weekly show produced with photos, videos and personal accounts from Observers around the world. Top international current affairs are covered by using eyewitness accounts from Observers- people who are at the heart of an event. They send their photos and videos, which are verified and contextualized by France 24 team of professional journalists in Paris. The Observers are volunteers, and are not paid for their contributions.

programme.title: Xiaomai's Health Notes
programme.desc: This as your health as the number 1 , all the 0 followed afterwards are all yours! But without health, without the number1, no matter how many 0 are added afterwards, it is still 0. How to avoid getting sick? How to get sick less frequently? How to recover faster? How to maintain a healthy life? "Xiaomai's Health Notes" specially collected all the easiest, most practical, cheapest and most efficient ways for all of you. A good day starts with "Xiaomai's Health Notes".

programme.title: True Love Blog

programme.title: OMG, Your Honour - EP 19
programme.desc: Two distinguished criminal barristers, Fan Siu Yu and Yiu Lik Hung, have been rivals since law school. Despite being classmates, their personalities and approaches to law are very different, leading to years of personal and professional conflict.

programme.title: Homeland Guardian & What's On Today - EP 8
programme.desc: Legendary Hong Kong police officer Ho Ho Fai, known for his role as one of the Three Tigers, faces a dramatic fall from grace after a failed mission. Joining the Special Duties Unit, he and his team fight to uncover and thwart a plot against Hong Kong‘s financial system.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2710
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Billionaire Story
programme.desc: A street separates two worlds. On one side, there is a hard-working life in the market with both hardships and laughter; one the other, it’s the life of rich and wealthy families who are intriguing and trembling.

programme.title: No Room for Crime - EP 16
programme.desc: Westminster suspects Lok-yee embezzles the shop’s money as she finds out her account balance. Tsan’s illness causes him to reflect on himself. He rediscovers his ambition and fighting spirit for joining the police force. He then receives information about some hardened criminal lying in ambush in the shop. Tsan swings into action without waiting for Chi-hin to come to provide reinforcement. He eventually gets into trouble. Lantern tells Yiu-ching he has some preferred son-in-law-to-be.

programme.title: In Bed With A Stranger - EP 14
programme.desc: Man-sum tells Ching-tin to locate someone that saved wealthy girl Kandy, who was once kidnapped. After interviewing her, Ching-tin confers with Cheung-sing as she thinks her savior was perhaps some gangster. Chi-hin asks Ching-tin to play some video game with him. Chi-hin also wants her to go with him to some concert as he has to complete some family bonding homework.

programme.title: The Tale of Lady Ok - EP 1
programme.desc: The story follows legal expert Ok Tae Young (Im Ji Yeon) during the Joseon period whose name, identity, and husband are all fabricated. Entangled in a fierce survival scheme, entertainer Cheon Seung Hwi (Choo Young Woo) is willing to risk his life for her.

programme.title: Ye Cheng - EP 10
programme.desc: Shu Cheng (Claire Jia), the daughter of the first aristocratic family, pretends to be a playgirl to conceal her identify. While promoting Shen Ye (Yuan Hao) as a courtesan, she discovers his multiple identities. They have no choice but to work together.

programme.title: Lost You Forever Season 1 - EP 2
programme.desc: A drama of mythical ancient times starring Yang Zi and Zhang Wanyi. The drama is adapted from novel titled Miss You Forever by the writer, Tonghua. It tells the story of love and hatred between Xiaoyao and Qiangxuan, Tu Shanjing, Chishui Fenglong and Xiangliu.

programme.title: Ms Incognito - EP 1
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] A bodyguard hides in a village as a kindergarten teacher to avoid her boss' enemies – but faces a new challenge in a skeptical strawberry farmer!

programme.title: Good Job - EP 6
programme.desc: Eun Seon-Woo (Jung Il-Woo) owns the biggest company in Korea and secretly runs a private detective office. Don Se-Ra (Kwon Yuri) was born with hyperacuity and uses it to help people. As the arrogant and the helpful meet to solve cases together, romance blossoms.

programme.title: Love's Ambition - EP 2
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] TV host Xu Yan (Zhao Lusi) and urban elite Shen Haoming (William Chan) appear to have a perfect marriage, but it is riddled with secrets. Eventually, they shed their facades, grow closer again, and rediscover themselves.

programme.title: Love's Ambition - EP 3
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] TV host Xu Yan (Zhao Lusi) and urban elite Shen Haoming (William Chan) appear to have a perfect marriage, but it is riddled with secrets. Eventually, they shed their facades, grow closer again, and rediscover themselves.

programme.title: Lost You Forever Season 1 - EP 4

programme.title: Ms Incognito - EP 2
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] A bodyguard hides in a village as a kindergarten teacher to avoid her boss' enemies – but faces a new challenge in a skeptical strawberry farmer!

programme.title: Good Job - EP 7
programme.desc: Eun Seon-Woo (Jung Il-Woo) owns the biggest company in Korea and secretly runs a private detective office. Don Se-Ra (Kwon Yuri) was born with hyperacuity and uses it to help people. As the arrogant and the helpful meet to solve cases together, romance blossoms.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 29
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a ‘Fire master’ in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING’s third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Madam Cutie On Duty - EP 18
programme.desc: FA PING (Priscilla Wong), who was often made fun of by the others for being ugly during her childhood, underwent cosmetic surgery in the wake of an accident. Ever since then, she has been firmly convinced that an attractive appearance has a significant impact on one's life, and remains the same after joining the police.

programme.title: I've Got The Power - EP 14
programme.desc: Chung Hau-nin (Ruco Chan), Kiu Yeuk-lam (Natalie Tong) and Ko Yung (Joel Chan) are complete strangers. After surviving a traffic accident, they astonishingly gain mystical power!_x000D__x000D_Hau-nin and Ding Shuk-man (Moon Lau) are a loving young married couple. Hau-nin intends to use his mystical power for his own benefit, but he knows how to use his mystical power to help other people as he is influenced by Yeuk-lam, who has a righteous character.

programme.title: Battle Against Evil, The - EP 15
programme.desc: General LI (TONG, MICHAEL) of the Chor Kingdom and wizard CHAI (CHAN HO, MOSES) were colleagues under the same mentor. LI killed CHAR when he found out that CHAR was having an affair with his wife SUKI (LEUNG TSAND, JADE). SUKI was ashamed of her affair, so she committed suicide. After she died, CHAI was furious and killed LI. He used bad magic to turn LI’s spirit into a cloud of hatred in order to prevent him from reincarnation.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 36
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 39
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 30
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a ‘Fire master’ in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING’s third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Madam Cutie On Duty - EP 19
programme.desc: FA PING (Priscilla Wong), who was often made fun of by the others for being ugly during her childhood, underwent cosmetic surgery in the wake of an accident. Ever since then, she has been firmly convinced that an attractive appearance has a significant impact on one's life, and remains the same after joining the police.

programme.title: I've Got The Power - EP 15
programme.desc: Chung Hau-nin (Ruco Chan), Kiu Yeuk-lam (Natalie Tong) and Ko Yung (Joel Chan) are complete strangers. After surviving a traffic accident, they astonishingly gain mystical power!_x000D__x000D_Hau-nin and Ding Shuk-man (Moon Lau) are a loving young married couple. Hau-nin intends to use his mystical power for his own benefit, but he knows how to use his mystical power to help other people as he is influenced by Yeuk-lam, who has a righteous character.

programme.title: Battle Against Evil, The - EP 16
programme.desc: General LI (TONG, MICHAEL) of the Chor Kingdom and wizard CHAI (CHAN HO, MOSES) were colleagues under the same mentor. LI killed CHAR when he found out that CHAR was having an affair with his wife SUKI (LEUNG TSAND, JADE). SUKI was ashamed of her affair, so she committed suicide. After she died, CHAI was furious and killed LI. He used bad magic to turn LI’s spirit into a cloud of hatred in order to prevent him from reincarnation.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 38
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 39
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: Class of Distinction - EP 18
programme.desc: Hong Kong superstar Leon Lai joins forces with many friends in the entertainment industry to star in the TVB drama "Good Morning Sir," playing a passionate and energetic young teacher who experiences unique challenges in school, family, and relationships.

programme.title: Knot To Treasure - EP 11
programme.desc: Wei (Zhu Jiang), the eldest son of Wei (Chen Jiewen), is wild and untamed. Under family pressure, he finally marries Shan (Zhang Fengni), with whom he has been dating for many years. After their marriage, Yat-sen develops an extramarital affair with Yan (Cui Jiabao), eventually living with her and abandoning Shan. Later, realizing Yan's overly open attitude towards relationships, he decides to pursue Shan again.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 31
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 32
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

programme.title: Defected, The - EP 21
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects.

programme.title: Defected, The - EP 22
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects.

programme.title: My Darling Genie
programme.desc: A genie who is trapped in a Chinese oil umbrella helps an honorable young man and his uncle to deal with a covetous loan shark.

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Two private detectives want to gain fame by solving a series of robberies. However, they were fooled by the King of Thieves during the investigation. It was later discovered that all the robberies were related to a Japanese businessman, Miyamoto. Who is the real King of Thieves?

programme.title: Whatever You Want
programme.desc: An illegitimate daughter of a businessman gets three wishes from a genie, Bo. However, Bo's magical power is far from perfect, leading to much hilarity in this charming fantasy comedy.

programme.title: Shark Busters
programme.desc: During the financial crisis, a vast majority of Hong Kong people experience difficulties in repaying debts. During this time, loan sharks use ruthless ways to force debtors to repay their loans and it is up to Officer Lee and his underground team to hunt down the head of this illegal organization.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: The Exodus
programme.desc: A low-ranking cop discovers a group of women, including his superior, Madam Fang and his wife, plotting to eliminate the world of men.

programme.title: Let's Have a Baby
programme.desc: De Sheng and Wan Jun have been married for years, but are unable to conceive. Wan Jun decides to undergo artificial insemination in the States and finally gets pregnant. She meets her cousin from the States who stays temporarily in their house with them, and De Sheng begins to suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: Teddy, once a renowned movie star, is facing a career decline. To make a living, he accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. Teddy's career regains momentum after he reunites with his long-lost daughter, but he is also confronted by a rival at the same time. His daughter and disciples decide to help him overcome this difficult situation...

programme.title: My School Mate, The Barbarian
programme.desc: Edward attends a new school which has a reputation for fighting. Student leader Stone, befriends Edward, but their friendship is tested when a local triad leader discovers that Edward comes from a wealthy family.

programme.title: 97 Aces Go Places
programme.desc: Hao Shi becomes the new triad boss after his father is killed by the pretty swindler, Ling. While professional gunman Drunken Gun is tasked to help Hao Shi take revenge, Ling is hunted by gangster Lei, from whom she has conned 2 million dollars. In the process, Hao Shi and Drunken Gun accidentally arrest Lei instead...

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 3
programme.desc: Gambling tycoon Man suddenly marries his new partner Sophie, which shocked his only son, Ken. In the wake of Man's heart attack, Ken must battle Sophie - who has persuaded Man to transfer his grand master title to her in the event of his death - for the rightful claim to the family's gambling business in a riveting game of mahjong.

programme.title: Behind the Yellow Line
programme.desc: A fresh graduate, Paul, strikes up an acquaintance with a pretty young girl, Monica, on the metro. Monica is involved in a love affair with a married man while Paul is also pursued by a rich girl. When Paul vows his true love for Monica, she suggests playing hide-and-seek with him in the metro to decide if they are fated to be together.

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters' best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Love in a Fallen City
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name by the famous novelist Eileen Chang and directed by the equally acclaimed director Ann Hui, this romance story depicts the challenging relationship between an introverted Shanghai divorcee and a cynical Malaysian playboy during the Japanese invasion of Hong Kong in the 1940s. Will the lovers be together in the end?

programme.title: Doubles Cause Troubles
programme.desc: Two squabbling cousins find themselves in more trouble than they can imagine after their tenant ends up dead. The gangsters and the police are both after them, and they have no idea what they have done wrong!

programme.title: Casino Tycoon
programme.desc: Inspired by the story of Macau's Casino King Stanley Ho, the movie traces his blood-splattered fight to the top from 1930s to 1960s. In 1941, a young graduate, Benny Ho, flees Hong Kong during the Japanese invasion and heads for Macau. Benny starts as a labourer but rises to the top of the city's casino business with his courage, wisdom and diligence.

programme.title: A Chinese Tall Story
programme.desc: While finding ways to rescue his disciples, Monk Tripitaka meets the lizard imp Mei Yan, the ugliest woman alive. Despite the conflict between good and evil, he falls for Mei Yan who sacrifices herself to save him many times. The Monk breaks his "no killing" rule to save his disciples, and things get more complicated as Princess Galaxy appears...

programme.title: Long Arm of the Law Part 3
programme.desc: Chinese ex-soldier Li is wrongly accused and seeks refuge in Hong Kong to escape a death sentence. En route, he meets Sam and Moon. While Li has fallen in love with Moon, Hong Kong triad kidnaps Moon and coerces Li into aiding a robbery. Meanwhile, the mainland police officer tracks Li's path to Hong Kong, intensifying the chase.

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: The Medallion
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Eddie is hired by the Interpol to capture a human smuggling gang leader known as Snakehead. Eddie dies in an action to protect a sacred child from being kidnapped, but is brought back to life by the child's magical medallion, allowing him to finally kill Snakehead.

programme.title: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: An old lady died after mysteriously falling off a building and her ghost appears to haunt the place. This freaked out the security guards, who invite ghostbuster Leo and his female assistant to help. In the process, Leo finds out that the old lady was killed by her son and daughter in law. To rest her soul, Leo promises to bring the couple to justice.

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 2
programme.desc: Fanny appears to be an ordinary housewife but is in fact a mahjong expert. Deeply in love with her husband, she loses to a seductive woman, Curvy, both on the mahjong table and in competing for her husband's love. With the help from her mahjong master, Fanny vows to take on Curvy in the Mahjong King tournament!

programme.title: Bullet and Brain
programme.desc: Nine years ago, two legendary criminals, Bullet and Brain, vowed not to kill and lie before they disappeared. Both now return for a mission - to protect the granddaughter of the triad boss. Can they succeed without breaking their vows?

programme.title: Mr Vampire III
programme.desc: Taoist conman Ming fails to banish vengeful spirits and escapes with his ghostly companions. As they seek refuge in a village, they encounter an evil witch whose goal is to eliminate the human race. Ming then allies with Taoist priest Master Jiu to battle the witch-but can they prevail against such overwhelming darkness?

programme.title: Dream Lover
programme.desc: Ka Shing meets Kitty one day and they fall quickly in love. However, Kitty disappears shortly and when they meet years later, she is already married. To comfort himself, Ka Shing asks a mystic master to let Kitty appear in his dreams so that he can be with her constantly, even though she can only be his dream lover...

programme.title: Midnight Fly
programme.desc: With her marriage in crisis, Michele takes off to Europe for a vacation and meets a Japanese woman named Miki. As they become friends and travel together, Michele discovers that Miki is her husband's mistress. When Miki goes missing in Morocco, Michele does everything she can to find her but ends up paying a heavy price...

programme.title: July Rhapsody
programme.desc: A 40-year-old high school teacher is in midlife crisis. His marriage is on the rocks and he is involved in a taboo romance with a female student who has a crush on him. Meanwhile, his wife is off to care for her dying ex-lover who shares a complicated history with the couple...

programme.title: Ninth Happiness
programme.desc: A comedy starring many popular movie stars, this is a story about a magistrate and his brothers aiming to introduce sin and romance into the virtuous community of Rainbow Village. As they vie for the affections of a charming young village maiden, conflicts arise, adding a twist to their mischievous endeavours.

programme.title: Tristar
programme.desc: Young priest Hong disguises himself to protect Bai, a prostitute, while Detective Liu investigates her ties to a prostitution ring. Hong finds Bai a lawful job and helps her negotiate with the underworld. Meanwhile, Liu's investigation causes misunderstandings - can he crack down on the gang? How will Hong manage his emotions as Bai falls for him?

programme.title: Return of the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: Knowing Guo Jing has won Huang Rong's hand in marriage using the kung fu learned from Jiu Yin manual, Ouyang Feng captures Huang and agrees to release her only if Guo can dictate the content of the manual. Will Guo give in to the threat?

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: King Gambler
programme.desc: This film was actually a lively forerunner to the gambling film craze, which eventually swept Asian cinema. Here, it's cardsharp versus cardsharp with a lot more kung-fu action, in a battle of wits and fists to become the king of the casino. The double stings and triple crosses raise in complexity and imagination until what started as an unusual box office risk became a top ten hit of 1976.

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: Bat Without Wings
programme.desc: The Bat Without Wings, a notorious rapist-murderer, has returned after a five-year absence. A young swordsman and a convoy master investigate the case and suspect that the Bat may be framed. A saying goes that a treasure map is hidden under the Bat's knife, so they try to use that to hunt the real culprit...

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: The Magnificent Trio
programme.desc: A group of farmers who are being oppressed by the local magistrates kidnap one of the magistrate's daughter in the hope of being heard by the authorities. A wandering swordsman offers his help and aiding him are two fighters who have both switched sides from being the oppressors to the oppressed. The trio fight back against the magistrates!

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: Shaolin Intruders
programme.desc: On a routine courier mission, the prestigious Chief was murdered by four mysterious monks. When all evidence pointed to Ching Hua, his friend Lei decides to clear his name by barging in the Shaolin Temple thrice. When Lei thought justice was served for the culprits, he soon realizes the table had turned and the monks stroke again. What follows is a series of intense pursuit for the ultimate villain!

programme.title: The Lotus Lamp
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai plays both mother and son in this lavish fable about a goddess who falls in love with a mortal scholar (Cheng Pei-pei in her debut role). Over two years in production, it was released on the first anniversary of Linda's tragic suicide.

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chu Twin becomes crazy after his son's arms were chopped off. For no reason, he harms four people causing them various disabilities. The four disabled form a band to learn Kung Fu from a master, in order to take revenge on Chu Twin.

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: Shaolin Temple
programme.desc: As more people are learning martial arts from Shaolin, the Qing court orders for it to be banned and plans to destroy the temple. The Shaolin disciples decide to take their protest to the streets, using Shaolin skills to curb their hatred, but when the Qing troops start attacking Shaolin Temple, the disciples vow to protect it at all costs.

programme.title: Shaolin Abbot
programme.desc: Monk Chi San is sent by his Shaolin Master to learn a special kung fu skill from a Wu Dang priest. He gets embroiled in a fight between the Qing and Ming camps along the way, and has to gather disciples to rebuild the burnt Shaolin temple at the same time.

programme.title: The Vengeful Beauty
programme.desc: The Flying Guillotine assassins are secretly working for the Emperor and its leader Jin is sent to kill Hon, who knows this secret. Hon's pregnant wife Rong seeks to kill Jin but retreats to protect her unborn child. When she is hunted down herself, Rong hooks up with a former Flying Guillotine member and her martial arts senior to fight back...

programme.title: Mercenaries From Hong Kong
programme.desc: Filmmaker Wong Jing produced Mercenaries From Hong Kong, his very first modern-day adventure drama. In the dramatic plot he wrote, he sends superstars Ti Lung, Chen Hui-min, Wang Lung-wei, Lo Lieh and Wang Yu on a deadly mission. The film's action sequences are all closely guided by three great kung fu choreographers, led by Tang Chia!

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: The Pirate
programme.desc: Pirate Chang Pao Chai discovers a leak in his ship after a successful raid on a foreign merchant ship. He goes ashore to get materials to patch up his ship, but encounters corrupt Qing officials oppressing the poor peasants. A good man at heart, he decides to help the peasants and gain a reputation of being a great pirate in the process.

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: The Enchantress
programme.desc: Shot on the Shaws' lot in the final years of Hong Kong's greatest studio, The Enchantress tells the story of martial artists who disappear in the night! Intrigued, wanna-be detective/swordsman Feng Chi-wu (Mok Siu-chung) is determined to find out what is happening. But when Feng finds out that an evil vampire spirit (Wei Chiu-hua) is killing swordsmen, he's in for more than he bargains for... It's an outlandish fairy-tale and martial arts fantasy, where your fists and sword aren't nearly enough!

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: Sixties pop star Carrie Ku plays the "Little Lark" in this romantic-drama of mistaken identity that is a treasure trove of some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: The Long Chase
programme.desc: Governor Yan is killed and his guard Fan identifies Kou as the assassin by his signature weapon, a dart. Kou is listed as a wanted man when he enters the city, but managed to escape arrest with the help of the innkeeper's daughter. At the same time, Fan is attacked by a bandit who pretends to be Kou. What are the secret plots behind these attacks?

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu Lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun Yang.

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: The Three Smiles
